mapper.select: select d.*, m.nick_name AS creator_nick_name, m.real_name AS creator_real_name, m.avatar AS creator_avatar, m.sex AS creator_sex, c.id AS content_id, c.diary_id AS content_diary_id, c.paragraph_sort AS content_paragraph_sort, c.paragraph AS content_paragraph, c.type AS content_type from t_diary d join member m on d.creator_id = m.id join t_diary_content c on d.id = c.diary_id where d.id = #{id}

select diary.*, c.id AS content_id, c.diary_id AS content_diary_id, c.paragraph_sort AS content_paragraph_sort, c.paragraph AS content_paragraph, c.type AS content_type from ( select d.*, m.nick_name AS creator_nick_name, m.real_name AS creator_real_name, m.avatar AS creator_avatar, m.sex AS creator_sex from t_diary d join member m on d.creator_id = m.id where d.is_open = 1 AND d.deleted = 0 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.limit} ) AS diary join t_diary_content c on diary.id = c.diary_id ORDER BY diary.create_time DESC
select count(1) from t_diary d where d.is_open = 1 AND d.deleted = 0

select diary.*, c.id AS content_id, c.diary_id AS content_diary_id, c.paragraph_sort AS content_paragraph_sort, c.paragraph AS content_paragraph, c.type AS content_type from ( select d.*, m.nick_name AS creator_nick_name, m.real_name AS creator_real_name, m.avatar AS creator_avatar, m.sex AS creator_sex from t_diary d join member m on d.creator_id = m.id where d.creator_id = #{creatorId} AND d.is_open = 1 AND d.deleted = 0 ORDER BY d.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.offset},#{page.limit} ) AS diary join t_diary_content c on diary.id = c.diary_id ORDER BY diary.create_time DESC
select count(1) from t_diary d where d.creator_id = #{creatorId} AND d.is_open = 1 AND d.deleted = 0
